main event: Ground observers at Fort Sill, Oklahoma reported seeing a reddish-orange object resembling the size of a dime, which hovered and later moved off.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at sunset and lasted for about 10 minutes., The object appeared larger when viewed through a scope., There was no sound or trail emitted by the object., Observers described the object as changing color from blue-white to orange at sunset., It was concluded that the object was probably an aircraft, but it was not conclusively identified.
sighted object: reddish-orange object, size of a dime
witness description: Provided by various individuals, including an electrician, a housewife, and military personnel, with reliability ratings ranging from fair to good.
